title: Enable all relevant markets from Compound and Aave
body:
The protocol currently tranches 4 markets from Compound (DAI, USDC, WBTC, LINK) and 3 from Aave on Polygon (MATIC, DAI, USDC). Since the protocol is able to tranche any yield generating asset from these protocols, adding all markets will be a straightforward technical task. 

Based on a conversation on Discord about a suggestion from the core team, we are now proposing tranching all the markets from Compound and Polygon Aave and offering them on the protocol's front-end.

This will offer protocol users a larger selection of markets, which will enable a wider range of APYs on the platform for users to select from.

❗Summary:

Enable the following Compound markets:

-Enable ETH market on Compound
-Enable AVE market on Compound
-Enable BAT market on Compound
-Enable COMP market on Compound
-Enable LINK market on Compound
-Enable MKR market on Compound
-Enable SUSHI market on Compound
-Enable TUSD market on Compound
-Enable UNI market on Compound
-Enable USDT market on Compound
-Enable YFI market on Compound
-Enable SUSHI market on Compound
-Enable ZRX market on Compound


Enable the following Aave Polygon markets:

-Enable USDT market on Aave Polygon
-Enable AAVE market on Aave Polygon
-Enable WETH market on Aave Polygon
-Enable WBTC market on Aave Polygon
author: 0x5C356190cd2aFd1806a151298e0A0001bDD5F542
